code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];export var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default{store:store,persistor:persistor};
